description:
Someday Stale will avenge his mother. He will get it done no matter what. If only he could remember the dream he had, would that help?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Gokuaku Oujo wa Gitei ni Negau
Le vœu de la princesse maléfique
The Villainous Princess Makes a Request of Her Brother
極悪王女は義弟に願う
